analyzed: de nyid dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang gsungs te/ bsgrub bya sgrub byed yang dag sbyor/ /gang
translated: The union of the object of attainment and the means of attainment🔽is said to be the approach.🔽The union of the vajra and lotus

analyzed: de bsnyen par gsungs pa ste/ /rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor pa/ /nye bar sgrub pa zhes brjod

analyzed: de/ /h'um phat yi ge yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa la ni g-yo bar gsungs/ /ngo bo nyid
translated: the shaking in the attainment is taught.🔽The intrinsic nature of one’s bliss🔽is said to be the great attainment.

original: kyi @317a */ /rang bde zhi/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes brjod do/ /bsgrub bya dang ni sgrub byed dag
analyzed: kyi @317a */ /rang bde zhi/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes brjod do/ /bsgrub bya dang ni sgrub byed dag
translated: The object of attainment and the means of attainment🔽enter the vajra and are delighted in the end.

original: /rdo rje rab zhugs mtha' mar dga'/ /shin tu bskyod pa'i byang sems kyis/ /mtha' la mchog
analyzed: /rdo rje rab zhugs mtha' mar dga'/ /shin tu bskyod pa'i byang sems kyis/ /mtha' la mchog
translated: With the bodhicitta that is extremely shaken,🔽the supreme delight is in the end.🔽From the dripping, free of passion,

analyzed: tu dga' ba'o/ /'dzag las chags pa dang bral ba'i/ /'di dag gi dbus la gang gi

analyzed: tshe rang gi zhi ba'i bde bar gyur pa de'i tshe bsgrub bya lhan cig skyes
translated: when one’s bliss is pacified, at that time the object of attainment is the connate joy.🔽In order to teach just that meaning, it is said,

original: pa'i dga' ba zhes pa'i don de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/ thog ma tha
analyzed: pa'i dga' ba zhes pa'i don de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/ thog ma tha
translated: “At the beginning, the end,🔽and in the middle, there is nothing other than joy.”

original: ma dag min dbus/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'ang min/ /'di ni mchog tu
analyzed: ma dag min dbus/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'ang min/ /'di ni mchog tu
translated: it is the supreme great bliss,🔽to be realized by oneself.

original: bde chen te/ /so sor rang gi rig pa yi/ /slar yang gsungs te/ chags
analyzed: bde chen te/ /so sor rang gi rig pa yi/ /slar yang gsungs te/ chags
translated: Again it is said:🔽Nirvana is explained as being free from attachment,

original: bral las ni myang 'das dang/ /mchog tu dga' ba srid par bshad/ /rab tu bde ba tsam
analyzed: bral las ni myang 'das dang/ /mchog tu dga' ba srid par bshad/ /rab tu bde ba tsam
translated: and existence as supreme joy.🔽Even by mere supreme bliss,🔽the innate is abandoned.

original: gyis kyang/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam par spangs/ /mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob/ /skad
analyzed: gyis kyang/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam par spangs/ /mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob/ /skad
translated: Supreme joy is attained,🔽and the variety of moments is abandoned.🔽The teacher said to the great being:

original: cig sna tshogs nyid ni spangs/ /ston pas gsungs pa sems dpa' che/ /bde ba chen po
analyzed: cig sna tshogs nyid ni spangs/ /ston pas gsungs pa sems dpa' che/ /bde ba chen po
translated: “Grasp the great bliss🔽until the end of enlightenment,

original: gzung bar bya/ /ji srid byang chub mthar thug par/ /sems can don gyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhes pa
analyzed: gzung bar bya/ /ji srid byang chub mthar thug par/ /sems can don gyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhes pa
translated: for the sake of sentient beings, O Vajradhara.”🔽And so on.

original: la sogs pa ste/ de'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gsum po dbyer med par gsungs te/ rgyu
analyzed: la sogs pa ste/ de'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gsum po dbyer med par gsungs te/ rgyu
translated: Therefore, how is the indivisibility of the three explained?🔽Because cause and effect are not different,🔽the three are well known as prior.

original: dang 'bras bu gzhan min phyir/ /rnam gsum sngon du rab tu grags/ /khyad par dga' ba'i dbus
analyzed: dang 'bras bu gzhan min phyir/ /rnam gsum sngon du rab tu grags/ /khyad par dga' ba'i dbus

analyzed: dag tu; ;bzhi pa'i rnam par grags pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar zhe na 'di dag gis/ /dbus ma la ni rab
translated: by these, the middle is explained.🔽The supreme, the end, the middle, the separation of joy,

original: tu bshad/ /mchog mtha' dbus ma dga' bral dang/ /stong dang stong min rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhes pa la
analyzed: tu bshad/ /mchog mtha' dbus ma dga' bral dang/ /stong dang stong min rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhes pa la
translated: the empty and the non-empty, the vajra holder,🔽and so forth.🔽How is it empty and non-empty?

original: sogs pa'i tshig las stong dang stong min ji ltar zhe na/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/
analyzed: sogs pa'i tshig las stong dang stong min ji ltar zhe na/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/
translated: The beginningless and endless peace,🔽this clear nature is the nature of awareness,

analyzed: /'di gsal ngo bo'i bdag nyid rig /stong dang snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems zhes par
translated: the indivisibility of emptiness and compassion,🔽is called the thought of awakening.🔽This is the conclusion.

analyzed: bya/ /zhes pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o/ /de thabs gang gis sgrub par byed na/ dkyil 'khor

analyzed: du yang gsungs te/ byed pa dang bral 'gro la rtag tu shar/ /bde ba'i rgyal po gcig nyid

analyzed: 'dzin gyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni sman no/ /shes rab kyi phung po rnam par dag
translated: The aggregate of pure meditative stabilization is the medicine.🔽The aggregate of pure wisdom is the elements.

original: pa ni khams rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnam par dag
analyzed: pa ni khams rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnam par dag
translated: The aggregate of the pure seeing of the wisdom of liberation is the seed.

original: pa ni sa bon gzhag pa'o/ /rdo rje'i sa rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje
analyzed: pa ni sa bon gzhag pa'o/ /rdo rje'i sa rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje
translated: The pure vajra stage is the vajra.

original: gzhag pa'o/ /ye shes ldan pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni aindra n'i la'o/🔽/kun du bzang po'i sa'i rnam par dag ba ni pushpa r'a ga'o/ /chos kyi
analyzed: gzhag pa'o/ /ye shes ldan pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni aindra n'i la'o/ /kun du bzang po'i sa'i rnam par dag ba ni pushpa r'a ga'o/ /chos kyi
translated: The pure stage of the one endowed with wisdom is indranīla.🔽The pure stage of Samantabhadra is puṣparāga.

original: sprin gyis rnam par dag pa ni padma r'a ga'o/ /legs pa'i blo gros kyi
analyzed: sprin gyis rnam par dag pa ni padma r'a ga'o/ /legs pa'i blo gros kyi
translated: The pure Dharma cloud is padmarāga.

original: sa'i rnam par dag pa ni ma ra ka ta'o/ /mi g-yo ba'i sa'i rnam par dag
analyzed: sa'i rnam par dag pa ni ma ra ka ta'o/ /mi g-yo ba'i sa'i rnam par dag
translated: The pure stage of excellent intelligence is marakata.🔽The pure stage of immovability is the conch.

original: pa ni dung ngo/ /ring du gyur pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni gser
analyzed: pa ni dung ngo/ /ring du gyur pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni gser
translated: The pure stage of the far-reaching is gold.

original: ro/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni mu men no/ /sbyang🔽dka' ba'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni byi ru'o/ /'od 'phro ba'i sa'i rnam🔽par dag pa ni shel lo/ /'od byed pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni beed'u rya'o/ /dri🔽ma med pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni bh'ishma'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa'i
analyzed: ro/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni mu men no/ /sbyang dka' ba'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni byi ru'o/ /'od 'phro ba'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni shel lo/ /'od byed pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni beed'u rya'o/ /dri ma med pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni bh'ishma'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa'i
translated: The purification of the stage of manifest is lapis lazuli. The purification of the stage of difficult to purify is coral. The purification of the stage of blazing is crystal. The purification of the stage of illuminating is beryl. The purification of the stage of spotless is bhisma. The purification of the stage of the joyful is gold. The purification of the stage of the stainless is silver. The purification of the stage of the radiant is copper. The purification of the stage of the far reaching is iron. The purification of the stage of the immovable is the center of the earth. The purification of the stage of the cloud of Dharma is the outer edge of the earth.🔽

original: rnam par dag pa ni mu tig go/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni mu tig go/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par
translated: The purification of the stage of Manifested is lapis lazuli. The purification of the stage of Difficult to Purify is coral. The purification of the stage of Radiating is crystal. The purification of the stage of Illuminating is beryl. The purification of the stage of Stainless is vaiḍūrya. The purification of the stage of Very Joyful is pearl. The purification of method and wisdom is gold and silver lotuses.

original: dag pa ni gser dang dngul gyi padma dag go/ /thams cad kyi steng du
analyzed: dag pa ni gser dang dngul gyi padma dag go/ /thams cad kyi steng du
translated: All of them are covered with copper plates.

original: zangs ma'i glegs bus dgab par bya'o zhes pa ni rin po che dgod pa'i cho ga'o/ /da ni🔽stegs bu'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ bzhugs par bya ba'i lha'i phyed dang bcas pa'i mtho
analyzed: zangs ma'i glegs bus dgab par bya'o zhes pa ni rin po che dgod pa'i cho ga'o/ /da ni stegs bu'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ bzhugs par bya ba'i lha'i phyed dang bcas pa'i mtho
translated: This is the procedure for arranging the jewels.🔽Now, the characteristics of the platform should be described: The platform is seven cubits long, half a cubit wide, and five cubits high.

original: bdun gyis ring ba'i stegs bu'o/ /zhed du rkang pas dman pa'i mtho lnga'i tshad do/ /srid kyi
analyzed: bdun gyis ring ba'i stegs bu'o/ /zhed du rkang pas dman pa'i mtho lnga'i tshad do/ /srid kyi
translated: The width is one cubit less than the length.

original: phyed kyis steng du'o/ /'di la steng gi ji ltar mtshungs pas khyad par du steng gi nges pa'o/ /sgo'i dbus
analyzed: phyed kyis steng du'o/ /'di la steng gi ji ltar mtshungs pas khyad par du steng gi nges pa'o/ /sgo'i dbus
translated: Here, the above is determined by the above being the same.🔽The deity that is to be placed in the center of the door

original: su blta ba'i lha dgod par bya'o/ /de'i phyir gang du gsang ba'i dbus su lha skal ba bzang🔽po rab tu ster ba'o/ /lte ba'i dbus su don rab tu ster ba'o/ /snying ga'i dbus su
analyzed: su blta ba'i lha dgod par bya'o/ /de'i phyir gang du gsang ba'i dbus su lha skal ba bzang po rab tu ster ba'o/ /lte ba'i dbus su don rab tu ster ba'o/ /snying ga'i dbus su
translated: is the deity who grants the best fortune in the center of the secret place.🔽In the center of the navel, it grants the best meaning.🔽In the center of the heart, it grants the best Dharma.

original: chos rab tu steng ba'o/ /mgrin pa'i dbus su shes rab rab tu ster ba'o/ /mdzod spu'i dbus su
analyzed: chos rab tu steng ba'o/ /mgrin pa'i dbus su shes rab rab tu ster ba'o/ /mdzod spu'i dbus su
translated: In the center of the throat, it grants the best wisdom.

analyzed: thar pa rab tu ster ba'o/ /stegs bu'i tshad las seng ge'i khri ji ltar mdzes pa'i khyad
translated: In the center of the ūrṇā, it grants the best liberation.🔽Since the deity is seated on a lion throne in the center of the platform, it is the best.

original: par la bzhugs pas so/ /lha bzhengs pa'i cha gsum gyi cha gnyis kyi tshad la bya'o/ /tshes
analyzed: par la bzhugs pas so/ /lha bzhengs pa'i cha gsum gyi cha gnyis kyi tshad la bya'o/ /tshes
translated: The deity should be made two-thirds of the size of the platform.

original: @328b grangs dang rgyu skar dang/ gza' dang yud tsam bzang po rnams la lha dang mi dag gi dbus su
analyzed: @328b grangs dang rgyu skar dang/ gza' dang yud tsam bzang po rnams la lha dang mi dag gi dbus su
translated: On an auspicious day, lunar mansion, planet, and moment, in the center of the gods and humans,

analyzed: stegs bu gzhag par bya'o// //da ni gtsug lag khang gi rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya ste/
translated: Now, the consecration of the temple should be described.

analyzed: de la gtsug lag khang zin nas zhal byas nas tshon bzang pos lha la sogs pa sna tshogs
translated: There, after the temple is completed and the plastering is done, the various deities, etc.,

analyzed: pas brgyan pa bshad pa rnams bri bar bya'o/ /rim pa ji snyed pa rnams la rnam par rgyal ba dang stobs sna tshogs par dmigs par bya'o/ /tshon sna lnga'i skud pa yungs kar gyi thum bu dang byang chub shing gi lo ma dang gtor ma dang d'urwa dang/ kunda sbyang ba'i me tog gi phreng
translated: adorned with good colors, should be painted as explained.🔽The various banners and flags should be placed on the various levels.

analyzed: pas rtsig pa'i phyi rol yongs su bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharmm'a:
translated: The outer wall should be surrounded with five-colored threads, mustard seeds, leaves of the Bodhi tree, sacrificial offerings, and garlands of durva and kunḍa purification flowers.🔽Then, having recited Om svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ

analyzed: sva bh'a ba shuddho &ham zhes brjod nas nam mkha' bzhin du rnam par bsgoms la ya yig
translated: svabhāva śuddho 'ham, and having meditated on space, the syllable Ya

analyzed: las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ ram yig las me'i dkyil 'khor/ bam yig las rgya mtsho chen po/
translated: and the great ocean from the syllable vaṃ.🔽In the middle of that, from the yellow syllable laṃ, is the square mandala of great power, yellow in color.

analyzed: /de'i dbus su lam yig ser po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa'o/ /de'i steng du
translated: Upon that,🔽from the syllable suṃ, one should visualize the Mount Meru, which is the nature of the four jewels.

analyzed: sum yig las rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri rab rnam par bsgoms te/ de'i steng du
translated: Upon that,

analyzed: h'um yig las sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus bhr'um

analyzed: kyi sku'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las gtsug lag khang gzhal yas khang du rnam par bsgoms nas

analyzed: shis gang zhig ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bum

analyzed: pa'i chus dbang bskur nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ //som su pra tishtha

analyzed: badzre sv'a h'a/ 'dis lan bdun du lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /ye dharm'a zhes pa la sogs
translated: With somaprabha vajra svāhā, one should perform the consecration seven times.

analyzed: pa'i tshigs su bcad pas kyang rab tu gnas par byas nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par
translated: Having also performed the consecration with the verse beginning with ye dharmā, one should stabilize it with the hundred-syllable mantra.🔽One should also make a great torma offering.

analyzed: bya'o// @329a */ /gtor ma chen po yang rab tu dbul bar bya'o// //da ni sku gzugs bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir
translated: Now, in order to install the image,

analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ de la sku gzugs thams cad sor bcu gnyis kyi cha yis
translated: The face of all images is one-twelfth🔽the size of the body.🔽The width is the same.🔽The shape of the face is of four types:

analyzed: zhal lo/ /de dang mnyam pa zheng du'o/ /til dang aa mra dang bya'i sgo nga dang/ / 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i dbye bas zhal gyi dbyibs ni rnam pa bzhi'o/ /cha gsum dang cha gnyis
translated: like a sesame seed, a mango, a bird's egg, or a discus.🔽The cheeks are to be made in order,

analyzed: dang phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis dang cha gcig gi go rims kyis 'gram rnams la spang bar
translated: one-third, one-half, one-and-a-half, and one part.

analyzed: bya'o/ /de la mo rnams kyi sku'i zhal la de nyid kyi dbyibs cha brgyad dang/ nas kyi cha
translated: For the faces of women, the shape of the face is eight parts,🔽and one part is the size of a barley grain.

analyzed: gcig gis so/ /cha bzhi yis spyi bo'i cha ste de gdugs kyi rnam pa'o/ /phyed dang bcas pa'i cha
translated: Four parts is the top of the head, which is shaped like an umbrella.🔽Four-and-a-half parts is the forehead.🔽The width is ten parts.

analyzed: bzhi yis dpral ba la'o/ /'phred la cha bcu yis so/ /nas gnyis lhag pa'i cha bzhi yis
translated: Four parts, plus two barley grains, is the nose.

analyzed: sna'i dkyus so/ /nas gnyis kyi rtse mo'i rgya'o/ /'byung ba'i mtshams nas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig go/ /rgya che ba la cha gnyis so/ /cha gsum gyi logs dag gi steng
translated: The tip of the nose is two barley grains. The width of the opening is one and a half barley grains.🔽The width is two barley grains. The width of the three sides of the three-sided opening is one and a half barley grains.

original: du'o/ /sna'i ka ba la gsum 'jug pa'i bu ga la nas gnyis so/ /til
analyzed: du'o/ /sna'i ka ba la gsum 'jug pa'i bu ga la nas gnyis so/ /til
translated: The width of the opening of the nose beam is two barley grains.

analyzed: gyi me tog 'dra bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og gi cha la rkang pa gcig gis
translated: It should be made like a sesame flower.🔽Below that, the lower lip is three barley grains.

original: lhag pa'i cha gsum mo/ /de la mchu la nas drug go/ /de la mnyam
analyzed: lhag pa'i cha gsum mo/ /de la mchu la nas drug go/ /de la mnyam
translated: The upper lip is two barley grains.🔽The width of the lower lip is two barley grains.

original: par ma mchu la'o/ /cha gnyis kyi rgyar ro/ /phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis ma mchu la'o/
analyzed: par ma mchu la'o/ /cha gnyis kyi rgyar ro/ /phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis ma mchu la'o/
translated: The width of the upper lip is one and a half barley grains.🔽Above that, the mouth is two barley grains.

analyzed: /de'i steng du nas gnyis kyi tshad kyis smra bya'o/ /ma mchu'i 'byung sa nas drug ste/ de'i
translated: The place where the lower lip comes from is six barley grains.🔽In the middle of that, a line of the reflection should be made.

original: dbus su gzugs brnyan gyi re kh'a bya'o/ /cha phyed kyis kha'i gru'o/ /nas gnyis lhag pa'i
analyzed: dbus su gzugs brnyan gyi re kh'a bya'o/ /cha phyed kyis kha'i gru'o/ /nas gnyis lhag pa'i
translated: The width of the mouth is one and a half barley grains.🔽The width of the lower lip is two barley grains.

original: cha gcig gis ko sko'i srid do/ /'phred du cha gnyis so/ /cha gnyis kyis rna ba'i rgyar ro/ /cha
analyzed: cha gcig gis ko sko'i srid do/ /'phred du cha gnyis so/ /cha gnyis kyis rna ba'i rgyar ro/ /cha
translated: Two parts is the width of the ear.🔽Four parts is the length.

analyzed: bzhi yis dkyus so/ /rgyab nas 'byung sa nas cha gnyis so/ /cha gnyis kyis rna ba'i nang zur
translated: Two parts is the depth.🔽Half of that is the upper part.

original: ro/ /de'i phyed kyis steng du'o/ /rna ba'i khugs la nas gnyis so/ /rna ba'i bu ga la
analyzed: ro/ /de'i phyed kyis steng du'o/ /rna ba'i khugs la nas gnyis so/ /rna ba'i bu ga la
translated: Two barley seeds is the ear canal.🔽Three barley seeds is the ear hole.

original: nas gsum mo/ /de dang mnyam pa rna ba'i gsang ba'o/ /rna shal 'phyang ba dang bug pa ni ji
analyzed: nas gsum mo/ /de dang mnyam pa rna ba'i gsang ba'o/ /rna shal 'phyang ba dang bug pa ni ji
translated: The same is the earlobe.🔽The hanging earlobe and the hole are as beautiful as the two ears.

analyzed: ltar mdzes pa'i rna ba gnyis po dag gi dbus su mgo la cha bco brgyad do/ /rgyab tu
translated: In the middle of the two ears, there are eighteen parts on the head.🔽In the back, there are fourteen parts.🔽At the end of the eyebrows, there are four parts.

original: cha bcu bzhi'o/ /smin ma dag gi mthar nas bzhi'o/ /smin ma'i srid la lnga'o/ /smin ma'i ri mo
analyzed: cha bcu bzhi'o/ /smin ma dag gi mthar nas bzhi'o/ /smin ma'i srid la lnga'o/ /smin ma'i ri mo
translated: The length of the eyebrows is five parts.🔽The eyebrow line is two and a half parts, also in the shape of a bow.

original: la @329b nas phyed de yang gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu'o/ /mig gi dkyus la cha bzhi'o/ /rkang pa gcig gis lhag
analyzed: la @329b nas phyed de yang gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu'o/ /mig gi dkyus la cha bzhi'o/ /rkang pa gcig gis lhag
translated: The length of the eye is four parts.🔽One part is the excess.

original: pa'i cha gcig gis zheng du'o/ /cha gcig gis mig gi 'bras bu'o/ /de'i cha gsum gyis dkar pa'i
analyzed: pa'i cha gcig gis zheng du'o/ /cha gcig gis mig gi 'bras bu'o/ /de'i cha gsum gyis dkar pa'i
translated: One part is the width. One part is the eyeball. Three parts are the white part.

original: cha'o/ /rnam pa ni ku mu ta dang autpala dang padma'i 'dab ma dang nya'i lto ba 'dra bar
analyzed: cha'o/ /rnam pa ni ku mu ta dang autpala dang padma'i 'dab ma dang nya'i lto ba 'dra bar
translated: The shape is like a kumuda, utpala, lotus petal, or fish belly.

original: bya'o// mig gi mthar cha gnyis so/ /smin ma'i re kh'a dang mig gi bar du cha
analyzed: bya'o// mig gi mthar cha gnyis so/ /smin ma'i re kh'a dang mig gi bar du cha
translated: Two parts are at the edge of the eye. Two parts are between the eye and the🔽eyebrow line.

original: gnyis so/ /dpral ba dad mig dang mgo dang ko sko'i 'byung ba rnams mnyam
analyzed: gnyis so/ /dpral ba dad mig dang mgo dang ko sko'i 'byung ba rnams mnyam
translated: The forehead, eyes, head, and neck are equal.

original: pa'o/ /kha'i zur nas mig gi 'bras bu dang glo dag nas rna bar thig
analyzed: pa'o/ /kha'i zur nas mig gi 'bras bu dang glo dag nas rna bar thig
translated: From the corner of the mouth to the eyeball and from the chest to the🔽ear, the lines are equal.

original: dang mgo bo nas smin ma'i ra k'a dag dang thig mnyam pa dang rna

analyzed: nas de'i dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes mngon par bri'o/ /yang na khri la chu skyes 'dab

analyzed: /byang du don yod grub pa dang/ rdo rje las dang/ rdo rje bsrung ba
translated: In the northeast, there is one vase marked with the five signs of Amoghasiddhi, Karma-vajra, Vajra-rakṣa,

original: dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje mtshams rnams kyi mtshan ma lngas mtshan pa'i bum pa gcig go/ /chu
analyzed: dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje mtshams rnams kyi mtshan ma lngas mtshan pa'i bum pa gcig go/ /chu

analyzed: skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa'i ze 'bru'i steng du stegs bu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
translated: Draw an eight-petaled lotus, and on its pistil a moon maṇḍala on a platform.

analyzed: ras bris la sogs pa'i steng g-yogs pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i lhag par mos pas

analyzed: so; /yang khrus kyi dkyil 'khor dang bral bas yang ngo/ /de bzhin du gzhan du yang khri la sogs

analyzed: pa'i rang bzhin la de'i mandala la ras bris dang pu sta ka dang mchod rten la sogs pa

analyzed: zhal shar du mngon par phyogs pas sam gzhan du yang rung ste bzhugs par bya'o/ /gang langs

analyzed: pa dang spyod lam gyi bar mi thog cing 'os pas so/ /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang dri gtsang khang du sku gzugs la sogs pa nam mkha'i khrus
translated: In a temple, caitya, or fragrant chamber, the image, and so forth, should be bathed in the sky.

original: kyi stegs bu rab tu sbyor bas gnyis po ji ltar dam tshig gi nyes🔽pa sku gzugs la sogs pa'i mdun du bya ste de la zhal mngon par
analyzed: kyi stegs bu rab tu sbyor bas gnyis po ji ltar dam tshig gi nyes pa sku gzugs la sogs pa'i mdun du bya ste de la zhal mngon par

analyzed: phyags pas slar yang zhabs bsil dang mchod yon la sogs pa 'bul ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod
translated: Having again offered the washing of the feet and the libation, etc.,🔽one should purify with the mantra for offering the libation.

analyzed: yon dbul ba'i sngags kyis sbyang bar bya'o/ /sbyang ba'i sngags dang me'i bya ba dang ldan pas
translated: Having purified with the mantra for purification and the rite of fire,🔽one should offer the libation in front.

original: nas mdun du mchod yon dbul lo/ /yongs su bskor bzhin pa'i mar rnams su h'um a'a: aom
analyzed: nas mdun du mchod yon dbul lo/ /yongs su bskor bzhin pa'i mar rnams su h'um a'a: aom

analyzed: zhes @335b pa'i yi ge rnams brjod nas sngon bzhin du shes par byas nas dri ni thugs kar dbul lo/
translated: one should understand as before, and offer the incense at the heart.

original: /me tog gi phreng ba dbul dkris nas mdun du mchod yon dbul lo/ /yongs su bskor bzhin
analyzed: /me tog gi phreng ba dbul dkris nas mdun du mchod yon dbul lo/ /yongs su bskor bzhin
translated: Having offered the garland, one should offer the libation in front.

original: pa'i mar mes aom badzra yaksha h'um/ 'dis lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas mar dang spos
analyzed: pa'i mar mes aom badzra yaksha h'um/ 'dis lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas mar dang spos
translated: Having recited the mantra OṀ VAJRA YAKṢA HŪṀ seven times while circumambulating with the lamps,🔽one should offer the lamp to the heart with the mantra OṀ VAJRA ĀLOKE AḤ HŪṀ.

original: dkar gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o zhes sbang ba'i rim pa'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje las kyi
analyzed: dkar gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o zhes sbang ba'i rim pa'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje las kyi

original: sngags kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i d'ur ba'i chun pos zangs ma'i snod na gnas pa'i🔽zho dang 'o ma dang/ mar dang sprang dang kar ste bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin rnams dkrugs
analyzed: sngags kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i d'ur ba'i chun pos zangs ma'i snod na gnas pa'i zho dang 'o ma dang/ mar dang sprang dang kar ste bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin rnams dkrugs
translated: that has been consecrated seven times with the mantra.

original: te zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang ba'i lci ba dang chu ste ba'i rnam lnga rnams🔽kyi ste/ aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes pa'i sa bon rnams lhag par gnas pa
analyzed: te zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang ba'i lci ba dang chu ste ba'i rnam lnga rnams kyi ste/ aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes pa'i sa bon rnams lhag par gnas pa
translated: The five nectars are milk, curd, butter, cow dung, and water.🔽The seeds Oṃ, Hūṃ, Traṃ, Hrīḥ, and Aḥ are especially present.

original: dang/ bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis lhag par gnas la gang zhig
analyzed: dang/ bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis lhag par gnas la gang zhig
translated: And the mantras Bhrūṃ, Aṃ, Jriṃ, Khaṃ, and Hūṃ are especially present.

original: ri mo dang ras bris dang pusta ka dang sa'i rang bzhin la sogs pa rnams
analyzed: ri mo dang ras bris dang pusta ka dang sa'i rang bzhin la sogs pa rnams
translated: Whatever is made of cloth, canvas, paper, clay, and so forth,🔽on that one should visualize the form of a reflection in a mirror.

original: la de rnams me long gi gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs la'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis mngon
analyzed: la de rnams me long gi gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs la'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis mngon
translated: With the mantras of Maitreya and so forth, one should consecrate the form.

original: par bsngags pa'i bum pa'i chu dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod pas
analyzed: par bsngags pa'i bum pa'i chu dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod pas
translated: The water from the vase of praise and the verses of auspiciousness🔽are recited.🔽May the auspiciousness of the supreme consecration

original: khrus bya'o/ /byams mgon la sogs byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams kyis/ /gang yang
analyzed: khrus bya'o/ /byams mgon la sogs byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams kyis/ /gang yang

original: gtsug lag khang dang sems can rnam dag grags/ /skye dgu'i rab rib nyes rnams ma lus 'joms gyur
analyzed: gtsug lag khang dang sems can rnam dag grags/ /skye dgu'i rab rib nyes rnams ma lus 'joms gyur
translated: and who completely destroy the faults and darkness of beings,🔽be yours.

original: pa/ /dbang bskur mchog gi bkra shis de ni khyed la shog/ /de nas 'khar ba'i snod du
analyzed: pa/ /dbang bskur mchog gi bkra shis de ni khyed la shog/ /de nas 'khar ba'i snod du

analyzed: ni/ /shes shing bzhengs par bya ba dang/ /zhig pa gso dang nye bar bsdu/ /chogs kyi 'khor

translated: The result of the Dharma🔽realm is the thirty-two marks of a great person.

analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi stegs bu'i rgyar bya'o/ /dpangs su rten cing 'brel par

analyzed: 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rnam par dag pas cha bcu gnyis so/

analyzed: /stegs bu na zlum po la gru bzhi pa cha bcu gnyis chas sam nyi
translated: The mandala is square, with thirty-two sides, or with twenty-four sides.

original: shu'i zur du bya'o/ /de'i steng du rjes su dran pa drug gi rnam par dag pas
analyzed: shu'i zur du bya'o/ /de'i steng du rjes su dran pa drug gi rnam par dag pas
translated: On top of that, the purity of the six recollections is the six corners.

original: cha drug pa 'degs pa'i stegs bu bya'o/ /de yang zlum po nyid du bya'o/
analyzed: cha drug pa 'degs pa'i stegs bu bya'o/ /de yang zlum po nyid du bya'o/

analyzed: /'dir yang bum pa'i dbus la de yang bum pa'i chos kyi sku'i rnam par

analyzed: dag pa mngon par shes pa drug gi rnam par dag bas cha drug pa'i
translated: the six parts are purified by the six superknowledges.🔽With the six parts, the vase is made round.

analyzed: thig gis bum pa zlum por bya'o/ /de'i steng du theg pa gsum gyi dag pas cha gsum gyis har
translated: Above that, the three vehicles are purified by the three parts,🔽ending at the tip of the haṃ.

analyzed: mi'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa'o/ /rgyar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rnam par dag pas cha bzhi

analyzed: pa'o/ /'di'i re re'i logs dag tu yang cung zang tshad pas lhag par bya'o/ /cha gcig gi
translated: Each of these is slightly larger.🔽One-third of one part is above and below the haṃ.🔽One part is the necklace.

analyzed: sum chas har mi'i steng 'og tu'o/ /cha gcig gis mgul rgyan te mgul rgyan gnyis kyi steng 'og
translated: Above and below the two necklaces,🔽the size of that is the upper and lower necklace.

analyzed: tu de'i tshad kyis mgul rgyan gyi rim pa'i steng 'og tu'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni me tog

analyzed: 'dzin pa can no/ /thung ba ni ji ltar mdzes par bya'o/ /har mi'i cha dgu'i gcig gi
translated: The short one should be made as beautiful as possible.🔽The base of the life-tree is one part of the nine parts of the harmi.

original: tshad kyis srog shing gi rtsa ba'o/ /de tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi'i dag pas gru bzhi pa'o/ /de'i🔽cha dgu'i gcig gi tshad kyis srog shing rtse mo'o/ /sems bskyed nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi rnam
analyzed: tshad kyis srog shing gi rtsa ba'o/ /de tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi'i dag pas gru bzhi pa'o/ /de'i cha dgu'i gcig gi tshad kyis srog shing rtse mo'o/ /sems bskyed nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi rnam
translated: It is square by the purity of the four immeasurable abodes.🔽The tip of the life-tree is one part of its nine parts.

original: par dag pas srog shing gi srid du cha nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /'jig rten skyong ba
analyzed: par dag pas srog shing gi srid du cha nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /'jig rten skyong ba
translated: The length of the life-tree is twenty-two parts by the purity of the twenty-two arousals of the mind.

original: rnams har mi dag gi mthar nas srog gi dbus so/ /gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rnam
analyzed: rnams har mi dag gi mthar nas srog gi dbus so/ /gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rnam
translated: The life-tree is in the middle of the life-tree of the world guardians from the end of the harmi.

original: par dag pa cha gcig gi tshad kyis 'jig rten skyong ba'i steng 'gog tu'o/ /'phags pa'i lam
analyzed: par dag pa cha gcig gi tshad kyis 'jig rten skyong ba'i steng 'gog tu'o/ /'phags pa'i lam
translated: The top of the world guardians is one part by the purity of nondual suchness.

original: yang lag brgyad kyi rnam par dag pas cha brgyad kyis gdugs kyi phreng ba gnas pa'i cha'o
analyzed: yang lag brgyad kyi rnam par dag pas cha brgyad kyis gdugs kyi phreng ba gnas pa'i cha'o
translated: The part where the garland of parasols abides is eight parts by the purity of the eightfold noble path.

original: @351a */ /cha bcu gsum gyi rnam par dag pas de yang gdugs kyi 'khor lo bcu gsum mo/ /de'i
analyzed: @351a */ /cha bcu gsum gyi rnam par dag pas de yang gdugs kyi 'khor lo bcu gsum mo/ /de'i
translated: Since it is pure as the thirteen parts, it is also the thirteen wheels of the parasol.

original: steng du cha phyed kyis char khab kyi gnas so/ /de'i steng du kun rdzob kyi bden pa
analyzed: steng du cha phyed kyis char khab kyi gnas so/ /de'i steng du kun rdzob kyi bden pa
translated: Above that, the half part is the rain gutter.

original: dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag gi rnam par dag pas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig🔽gi tshad kyis mgrin pa mtho ba'o/ /de yang mgrin pa nas srog shing gi rtse mo'i
analyzed: dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag gi rnam par dag pas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gi tshad kyis mgrin pa mtho ba'o/ /de yang mgrin pa nas srog shing gi rtse mo'i
translated: Above that, since it is pure as the relative and ultimate🔽truths, the height of the neck is the measure of one and a half parts.🔽Further, from the neck to the tip of the life-rod,

original: mthar thug pa rgyal de'i phyed do/ /de'i steng du bla na med pa'i snying
analyzed: mthar thug pa rgyal de'i phyed do/ /de'i steng du bla na med pa'i snying
translated: it is the measure of half of that.

original: rje chen po rnam par dag pas gtsug tor ro/ /de bzhin du lhung bzed🔽kyi rnam pa ni stobs bcu dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
analyzed: rje chen po rnam par dag pas gtsug tor ro/ /de bzhin du lhung bzed kyi rnam pa ni stobs bcu dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
translated: Above that, the uṣṇīṣa is the purity of unsurpassed great compassion.

original: brgyad kyi rnam par dag pas cha nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi tshad kyis 'og gi stegs bu'i rgya
analyzed: brgyad kyi rnam par dag pas cha nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi tshad kyis 'og gi stegs bu'i rgya
translated: Similarly, since the form of the alms bowl is the purity of the ten powers and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, the lower platform is the measure of twenty-eight parts.

original: ru'o/ /stobs lnga'i rnam par dag pas cha lnga ni 'degs pa'o/ /stegs bu'i steng 'og tu'o/ /byang
analyzed: ru'o/ /stobs lnga'i rnam par dag pas cha lnga ni 'degs pa'o/ /stegs bu'i steng 'og tu'o/ /byang
translated: The five parts that are raised are the five parts of the five powers.

original: chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rnam par dag pa cha bdun te bum pa'i dpangs so/ /lhag
analyzed: chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rnam par dag pa cha bdun te bum pa'i dpangs so/ /lhag
translated: The seven parts are the seven parts of the seven factors of enlightenment.🔽The remaining parts are as before.🔽Similarly, the six parts are the ten knowledges, the twelve powers, and the four fearlessnesses.

original: ma rnams ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du yan lag drug gi rnam pa ni shes pa bcu dang dbang bcu gnyis dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rnam par dag pas cha nyi shu rtsa drug gi tshad
analyzed: ma rnams ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du yan lag drug gi rnam pa ni shes pa bcu dang dbang bcu gnyis dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rnam par dag pas cha nyi shu rtsa drug gi tshad
translated: The twenty-six parts are the measure of the lower platform.

original: kyis 'og stegs bu'i rgya ru'o/ /gru bzhi 'byed pa'i rnam par dag pas cha bzhi yis 'degs
analyzed: kyis 'og stegs bu'i rgya ru'o/ /gru bzhi 'byed pa'i rnam par dag pas cha bzhi yis 'degs
translated: The four parts that are raised are the four parts of the four discriminations.

original: pa'i stegs bu'i steng 'og tu'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rnam par dag pas cha brgyad bum pa'i
analyzed: pa'i stegs bu'i steng 'og tu'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rnam par dag pas cha brgyad bum pa'i
translated: The eight parts are the eight parts of the eight liberations.🔽The remaining parts are as before.

original: steng du'o/ /'dir yang lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du bum pa'i rnam pa ni
analyzed: steng du'o/ /'dir yang lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du bum pa'i rnam pa ni
translated: Similarly, the parts of the vase are the ten perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis dang/ gzungs ma bcu gnyis rnam par dag pas cha nyi🔽shu rtsa bzhis 'og gi stegs bu'i rgya ru'o/ /rnam par dag pa gsum gyi rnam par dag
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis dang/ gzungs ma bcu gnyis rnam par dag pas cha nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'og gi stegs bu'i rgya ru'o/ /rnam par dag pa gsum gyi rnam par dag
translated: The twelve perfections and the twelve dhāraṇīs are purified as the twenty-four steps.🔽The three purities are purified as the three steps above and below the platform.

original: pas cha gsum gyis 'degs pa'i stegs bu'i steng 'og tu'o/ /gsung rab yan lag dgu'i rnam
analyzed: pas cha gsum gyis 'degs pa'i stegs bu'i steng 'og tu'o/ /gsung rab yan lag dgu'i rnam
translated: The nine branches of scripture are purified as the nine steps of the vase.

original: par dag pas cha dgu yis bum pa'i srid do/ /lhag ma rnams ni sngon ma bzhin
analyzed: par dag pas cha dgu yis bum pa'i srid do/ /lhag ma rnams ni sngon ma bzhin
translated: The rest are the same as before.

original: du'o; /de ni rnam pa bzhi kar gyi yang thun mong gi rnam par dag pa brjod par bya'o/ /cha bcu
analyzed: du'o; /de ni rnam pa bzhi kar gyi yang thun mong gi rnam par dag pa brjod par bya'o/ /cha bcu
translated: That is the common purity of all four types.

original: drug yongs su gang ba'i rnam par dag pas cha bcu drug gi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/
analyzed: drug yongs su gang ba'i rnam par dag pas cha bcu drug gi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/
translated: The sixteen parts being filled are purified as the sixteen steps above the moon maṇḍala.

original: /de la yang srog shing gnas pa'i rgyal 'byung ba chen po lnga'i steng du sbyin pa'i sa gzhi'o/
analyzed: /de la yang srog shing gnas pa'i rgyal 'byung ba chen po lnga'i steng du sbyin pa'i sa gzhi'o/
translated: On that, the life-tree is the foundation of generosity above the five great elements.

original: @351b de yang tshul khrims rnam pa bcu dang mi dge ba bcu spong ba'i rnam par dag pas 'og gi
analyzed: @351b de yang tshul khrims rnam pa bcu dang mi dge ba bcu spong ba'i rnam par dag pas 'og gi
translated: The ten aspects of ethics and the ten nonvirtues are purified as the steps below the moon maṇḍala.

original: stegs bu dang rtsig pa'i rgyar cha brgyad kyis bya ste 'gro ba rnams dang rjes su mthun par
analyzed: stegs bu dang rtsig pa'i rgyar cha brgyad kyis bya ste 'gro ba rnams dang rjes su mthun par
